SqlQueryStrings.SqlQueryString: SELECT X.User_Id,X.Username,X.First_Name,X.RoleId,Y.RoleName,X.Status AS Authenticated FROM PM_Users X, PM_User_role Y WHERE X.UserName=@UserName AND X.Password=@Password AND X.RoleId=Y.RoleId AND X.Status=1
SELECT X.User_Id As UserId, X.Username,X.First_Name AS 'First name', Y.RoleName FROM PM_Users X, PM_User_role Y WHERE X.Status=@Status AND X.RoleId = Y.RoleId
SELECT RoleId, RoleName FROM PM_User_role WHERE Status=@Status
UPDATE PM_Users SET status=0 WHERE User_Id in (@UserIdList)
